extendedInfo.description: Congratulations! You've discovered the best conceal carry app for your Android phone. The only app that lets you know when you're in an unfriendly state.Set your home state in settings, turn on Notifications, and CCW-USA will alert you when you venture into a non-reciprocal state. Links to each state's laws are included!

reviews.comment: This app is awful. The list of states that take my MI permit is right. But, if I go to those same states, notify tells me that they don\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Total junk. Needs major improvements. I wouldn\'t download it again if they paid ME $1.99.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Po\'duser
reviews.comment: \"G\'zOne \"  problems with GPS locations.  Dead links to state links.  Update! Update! Update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All it does is link you to states web site. Much better apps out there this one seems to just give minimum and take your money and run.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: In addition to having questionable information (it\'s not like this information is hard to find) I\'ve had three force-close events since I purchased this app a few hours ago.  How difficult is it to present static information in a format that doesn\'t self-destruct on the hour?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to turn off notifications because it would go off at night to notify me a state didn\'t honor my permit. The info are Links that you could Google
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only links to the state website. Free PDF downloads work better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: First warning it gave was wrong but the page it sent me to had the correct info. I don\'t want to be overly dramatic but I carry for defense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: ARE YOU EVER GOING TO FIX IT? Says PA. doesn\'t respect DE. But I have DE. & PA. permits selected? After update DE. doesn\'t respect DE. USELESS APP!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uninstalled until it is accurate. I have a Utah and it says Texas doesn\'t honor it. I live in Texas and they do honor it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please spend your money on another app
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work and when it does only gives links to state sites
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why am I paying two dollars for free information. It only is a webportal to state law websites. Uninstall and refund
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not up to date on reciprocity. Free pdf download from handgunlaw.us is better until this gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree, need to be able to set at least 2 states permits.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This works great, love the notifications while I\'m traveling
reviews.author: A Google User
